languages.text: "Вот и хорошо. Довольно на сегодня безумных речей и проблем с глазами".
"Glad to hear it. That is quite enough mad ramblings and eye problems for one day."

languages.text: "Schön, das zu hören. Für heute hatte ich genug wirres Gerede und Augenprobleme."
languages.original_text: "Glad to hear it. That is quite enough mad ramblings and eye problems for one day."

traits.locale_text: "Schön, das zu hören. Für heute hatte ich genug wirres Gerede und Augenprobleme."

languages.text: « Content de vous l'entendre dire. J'ai mon compte d'inepties et de problèmes oculaires pour aujourd'hui. »
languages.original_text: "Glad to hear it. That is quite enough mad ramblings and eye problems for one day."

traits.locale_text: « Content de vous l'entendre dire. J'ai mon compte d'inepties et de problèmes oculaires pour aujourd'hui. »

languages.text: «Me alegra oírlo. Ya ha habido suficientes desvaríos y males de ojo por un día».
languages.original_text: "Glad to hear it. That is quite enough mad ramblings and eye problems for one day."

traits.locale_text: «Me alegra oírlo. Ya ha habido suficientes desvaríos y males de ojo por un día».

languages.text: “那就好，今天看到的问题，听到的胡言乱语已经够多了。”
languages.original_text: "Glad to hear it. That is quite enough mad ramblings and eye problems for one day."

traits.locale_text: “那就好，今天看到的问题，听到的胡言乱语已经够多了。”

languages.text: 「それは何よりです。狂ったようなうわごとと目の不調は、今日だけで十分ですから」
languages.original_text: "Glad to hear it. That is quite enough mad ramblings and eye problems for one day."

traits.locale_text: 「それは何よりです。狂ったようなうわごとと目の不調は、今日だけで十分ですから」

languages.text: "Çok sevindim. Bir gün için yeterince deli saçmasına katlanıp göz sorunu çektik."
languages.original_text: "Glad to hear it. That is quite enough mad ramblings and eye problems for one day."

traits.locale_text: "Çok sevindim. Bir gün için yeterince deli saçmasına katlanıp göz sorunu çektik."
